dialogue.introduction: Ise-class Aviation Battleship, Hyuuga... Pushing forward.
dialogue.library_intro: I'm Hyuuga. I got the ability of carrying aircrafts, and now I am an aviation battleship. I fought bravely in Battle of Leyte Gulf. An operation of transporting tactical goods "Operation Hoku-Go", it is one with a lot of memories for me. Ah yes, JMSDF's DDH "Hyuuga" succeeds to my name.
dialogue.secretary1: Oh... It's you. You're still here.
dialogue.secretary2: Looks like the days of plain-old battleship is over.
dialogue.wedding: Aviation Battleship... got a nice ring to it, yeah? You get it, right? Alright... let's drink! We're not going back 'till morning!
dialogue.show_players_score: Here's a letter for you... No, not from me.
dialogue.equipment1: The unlikely age of the aviation battleship, is it?
dialogue.equipment2: So the world's finally caught up with me then.
dialogue.supply: The unlikely age of the aviation battleship, is it?
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I won't be able to carry the 60's even with the repairs, you know?
dialogue.docking_complete: The repairs seem to be finished.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new face is coming to our fleet... Let's go welcome her.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet's returned. Let's hope they're all present and well...
dialogue.battle_start: Get to know the true power of the aviation battleships!
dialogue.attack: That's right... Launch the fighters and charge-in. Like this.
dialogue.night_battle: You're a problem... We'll have to wipe you out here!
dialogue.night_attack: Well, it's not like the rear deck is a shield...
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Well, it's not like the rear deck is a shield...
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Well, it's not like the rear deck is a shield...
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Well, it's not like the rear deck is a shield...
dialogue.mvp: I see, so it's an age of aerial combat from now on... I hope Mogami's faring fine as well.
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Ugh... I wouldn't want Ise to see me like this
dialogue.sunk: Even if I get heavily damaged and sunk to the bottom of the sea, it is inside Kure naval base that I'll accept this fate, I surely decided so, but… it cannot be helped.
dialogue.air_battle: Well, it's not like the rear deck is a shield...
dialogue.end_of_year_2014: Hm, it's time to do cleaning. I will polish Zuiuns in the hangar.
dialogue.new_year_2015: It's a new year... Happy New Year, Ise, also Admiral. Treat me well this year too.
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Oh, yeah, it's that thing called Valentine's, isn't it? Alright then, I'll give you a special Zuiun. Here.
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Oh? So it's an anniversary today... Looks like everybody is happy. Well...that's not too bad.
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: It really rains a lot during this time of the year. It is not good if there are trouble with Zuiun's operation, but...
dialogue.early_summer_2015: I don't particularly mind of this season. Ise... Ise? Oh, she's asleep.
dialogue.christmas_2015: Uh... so this is Christmas... is it... Hmm, red and green, and then white is it? Not bad.
